pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video is a scenery shot that slowly zooms in on the upper floors of a large, multi-story brick building. The building features classic architecture with numerous windows set against a clear, pale blue sky. The shot provides a detailed, low-angle view of the building's corner facade.
